availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Pleasant Thomas Walker (Ohio County, Kentucky, laborer.)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Amanda Walker. Father of Dudley Walker and Alexander Walker. Enslaved by Elijah Dudley Walker in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 12.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford/7th Precinct, p. 14.
"Tracked," The Ohio County News (Hartford, KY), March 14, 1877, p. 3.
